title: Terrace On The Park
description: Overlooking breathtaking views, Terrace On The Park is a dynamic wedding venue suspended above Flushing Meadow Park in Corona, New York. From all directions, some of the city’s most famous sights are visible through the floor-to-ceiling windows found in their event spaces. Here, couples can take advantage of the picturesque photoshoots and savor every romantic moment. Terrace On The Park offers excellent guest services on par with sophisticated style.

This venue features six different event spaces and can host up to 700 guests. With a choice between both indoor and outdoor areas, from roof-top gardens to elegant ballrooms, there is a setting to suit an array of tastes. The staff here are ready to transform any of these spaces to ensure that each couple enjoys a personalized experience all their own. Featuring chic and refined lounge spaces and polished hardwood floors, these rooms provide impressive canvases from which couples can realize their ultimate wedding visions. Get-ready rooms are featured onsite to allow couples a private space to prepare for their big event.

The professional staff here take pride in their close attention to detail and can assist clients in planning every aspect of the event. Terrace On The Park’s services range from planning assistance, event rentals, catering options, and providing lighting and sound equipment. Decorations, furniture, and an expansive dance floor are all available to rent on the day. Aside from weddings, this venue can also host engagement parties and wedding showers.

Their talented chefs are ready and willing to create exquisite menus that meet the desires of each couple. Their sample wedding menu gives the option of choosing between hors d'oeuvres, pasta or salad courses, hot and cold selections, and dessert. A range of serving styles from buffet and stationed options to plated dinners are offered to suit the needs of every party. A cake and chocolate fountain can also be requested in advance.

title: Hunt & Fish Club NYC
description: Hunt & Fish Club NYC is an elegant wedding venue located in New York, New York. This stunning setting was thoughtfully designed by contemporary artist Roy Nachum and the architecture firm Studio Iyor to recreate the glory of 1960s New York. It offers an old-time feel and encourages guests to savor every moment of their visit.

Hunt & Fish Club NYC offers a selection of stunning spaces where you can celebrate your love story. The White Room is suitable for up to 130 guests in an unforgettable seated meal setting. It boasts high ceilings and unique light fixtures that will take your breath away. The space is softly illuminated and features a neutral color palette that will blend seamlessly with the theme of almost any wedding. Mirrored pillars and walls open the room up even more and add a touch of sophistication. The Blue room can accommodate up to 70 people and offers a modern, fashionable vibe. Tiled floors and marbled walls elevate the elegance of the venue, while a large light fixture adds to the artsy feel of the room. For those hoping to host a more intimate gathering, The Green Room holds 24 people in a more cozy setting.

The Hunt & Fish Club NYC team would be honored to help bring your vision to life. Their impressive menu features oysters, lobster, shrimp, salads, pasta, and steak. Each dish can be paired with a delicious red or white wine. Contact the team today for more information on how they can make your wedding dream come true.

title: One If By Land, Two If By Sea
description: One if by Land, Two if by Sea has been recognized for its classic menu, long history, and beautiful decor. It is often cited as the most romantic restaurant in New York City.
The decor features candlelit tables, brick fireplaces, a baby grand piano and a private garden. The restaurant operates inside a historic, land-marked carriage house built in 1767.
Established in 1973, One if by Land, Two if by Sea soon became the go to spot in NYC for engagements, anniversaries and weddings.
More people are said to have announced their engagement here than any other restaurant in Manhattan.

Located on Barrow Street, One if by Land, Two if by Sea is an elegantly restored 18th century landmark Greenwich Village carriage house and stable once owned by Aaron Burr, vice president of the United States (1801-1804). Rumored to still receive occasional visits of Burr’s ghost, upon entering its inviting elegance, one can easily understand why spirits of the other worlds would also be charmed into this locale. Tables adorned with fresh roses and long tapered white candles are set in an early American décor. Adding to the amorous atmosphere is a live pianist playing romantic melodies and the crackle of the four fireplaces.

One if by Land, Two if by Sea opened in 1972 after a huge restoration of the carriage house which seemed more like an excavation. Discovered under layers of plaster and wood were many small treasures of the past, such as old coins, hand-made horseshoes and antique bottles. The original hitching post dating from the 18th century is still in tact in the bar area of the restaurant.\
With its captivating surroundings and impeccable attention to detail, One if by Land, Two if by Sea is the ultimate aphrodisiac for romantic Epicureans.

title: 3 West Club
description: The 3 West Club is a historic building located in the heart of Midtown Manhattan, right off of Fifth Avenue in New York City. This elegant wedding venue resides in a nine-story building that boasts a variety of areas for couples to choose from. The beautiful setting can be transformed to suit a variety of wedding styles and sizes. With a classic ambiance, world-class cuisine, and seamless service, this luxurious event space offers diverse banquet halls for you and your guests to explore throughout the day or night.

The 3 West Club offers six main spaces for you to choose from. The Grand Ballroom is the largest space and is complete with warm, inviting decor, two crystal chandeliers, 20-foot ceilings, and beautiful hardwood floors. This grand space is able to accommodate up to 150 guests in a banquet-seating style for dinner and dancing. The Grand Salon, which is another space in the building, provides plenty of natural light and elegant marble fireplaces that help to create a magical atmosphere when couples walk down the aisle. This room can accommodate up to 120 banquet-style seated guests. If you prefer to take advantage of the city-views, you can enjoy The Solarium, which is located on the 9th floor of The 3 West Club. The Solarium contributes stunning scenes of St. Patrick's Cathedral as well as an outdoor terrace. This is an ideal space for a cocktail hour or an after-party with standing room for up to 130 guests. Meanwhile, the Pratt Lounge has an old-world New York City ambiance, complete with rich red and wood details, two marble fireplaces, a baby grand piano, antique furnishings, and fifteen-foot ceilings. This parlor is another lovely option for a cocktail hour, with room for up to 150 standing guests. Lastly, the Lincoln Room and Library are great spaces for getting ready, relaxing, and taking photos prior to the big event.

The 3 West Club has a full staff of experienced professionals who will be with you every step of your wedding day. As you prepare for your big day, you will have the opportunity to work with the venue's event manager, in-house chef, banquet captains, service staff, and banquet manager. The manor offers both a standard wedding package and a premium wedding package for couples to choose from. The following services and facilities can also be acquired by couples who choose this venue:

title: The View at The Battery
description: The View at Battery Park is a luxurious New York City restaurant venue that hosts weddings and other milestone occasions. This Masterpiece Caterers venue, previously known as the Battery Garden Restaurant, welcomes couples seeking to hold their nuptial celebration in Manhattan. This venue’s team will strive to bring your wedding vision to life - a romantic dream come true.

The Battery Garden Restaurant has found new life through extensive restoration and renovation as The View at Battery Park. Masterpiece Caterers have experience with the renovation of India House and have used this wealth of experience to make The View a luxurious locale. This restaurant is equipped with numerous upscale amenities. The Liberty Ballroom on the second floor offers incredible bay views for guests as they dine and dance. This space is enhanced by lighting fixtures and wall sconces, textured blackout drapes, ceiling beams and fans, columns, and wall mirrors. The Garden Ballroom on the first floor features a bamboo wood floor in the dining area adjacent to an open kitchen for a unique experience. Pendant lights and wall sconces add to the ambience of this aesthetically-pleasing space. The Atrium Dining Room offers another indoor option with reclaimed wood tables and a black tile ceiling. Alternatively, you can take your celebration out to the Upper Patio with waterside seating, an outdoor bar, and a beer garden. Additionally, a valet parking service and wheelchair-accessible features offer convenience for you and your guests. This venue offers a variety of outstanding options from which to select your ceremony and reception locations.

Wedding service at The View at Battery Park can be customized to your requirements with all-inclusive packages available for your ease of mind. This venue’s team can take care of catering, bar services, vendor coordination, and the setup and cleanup of your celebration. On-site event equipment is available, including lighting systems, tableware, linens, and more.

This upmarket restaurant venue offers a variety of delectable fare for engagement parties, bridal showers, rehearsal dinners, elopements, ceremonies, and receptions. The wedding party suite features miniature sandwiches, clear beverages, and fresh fruit. The pre-ceremony invitation beverage is a choice of still or sparkling water or champagne. The cocktail hour selections include eight butler-passed canapes and hors d'oeuvres with two cocktail stations and a choice of a pasta or carving station. The dinner menu begins with two entrées and one silent vegetarian or vegan entrée, then progresses to the wedding cake by Ron Ben-Israel Cakes. Butler-passed desserts, open bar service, dinner wine service, and a toast will leave you and your guests with a remarkable experience.

Celebrate at Snug Harbor sits on 83 acres of carefully landscaped gardens. Couples can exchange vows in one of their many botanical gardens, such as the Rose Garden and Tuscan Garden, or the Newhouse Museum. Any of these settings will provide a serene and beautiful atmosphere to kick off your big day. The White Garden or Chinese Scholar Garden can be used alongside the tented pavilion to create a comfortable outdoor experience. It can comfortably accommodate up to 250 guests. title: Prince George Ballroom

The ballroom has been restored to its original Neo-Renaissance design and has been since named a landmark venue. The hall boasts over 9,000 square feet of stunning space and features a variety of amenities, including a modern gallery entrance and a fully-equipped kitchen. With its stunning lighting, color-themed rooms, intricately-detailed ceilings, and beautiful architecture, this one-of-a-kind venue offers a space in which couples can confidently host a memorable event.

The space inside this building is comprised of three flexible event facilities: The Ballroom, The Gallery, and The Ladies’ Tea Room. The Ballroom, their biggest space, can be transformed into a wedding dream and boasts an open floor plan for flexibility and creativity. Whether you want round tables or long tables, their staff will assist with setting up and designing a floor plan that works for your party size. The Ladies’ Tea Room and The Gallery are more ideal for smaller, intimate gatherings, such as ceremonies and cocktail receptions. The Ballroom can comfortably accommodate up to 300 seated guests, while the Gallery and the Tea Room can seat 125 and 55 loved ones, respectively.

Prince George Ballroom allows couples to utilize its in-house furniture, which includes a variety of tables and gold Chiavari chairs. The staff will provide couples with a list of exclusive vendors such as caterers and lighting professionals, as well as a list of preferred wedding businesses. This comprehensive list encompasses photographers, stationery designers, event planners, accommodation rentals, and more. The venue's staff has experience assisting with couples' ceremonies, receptions, bridal showers, engagement parties, and rehearsal dinners. They can also supply couples with event rentals. Moreover, beverage services can be accommodated by the venue. Other facilities include the following:

This building was built in 1904 and was a main fixture in the Madison Square neighborhood. It has been featured in Vogue videos, television shows, fashion shows, NYFW, and more. The number of fashion shows and photoshoots that have been hosted by Prince George Ballroom speak to its photogenic nature and beautiful backdrops, which will complement your wedding's rich and intimate ambiance.

Guests can share the magical moment in a one-of-a-kind setting as there is ample space for everyone to take their seats. Outdoor cocktail hours at North Shore House are also something that couples can savor with other invitees. When the time comes for the all-important reception, the interiors, defined by rustic and contemporary touches, are available. Here, there is ample room for everyone to enjoy a seated meal. Outdoor receptions can also be accommodated, allowing the happy couple and their nearest and dearest to enjoy an al fresco experience. Conveniently, rehearsal dinners and morning-after brunches can also be hosted at this splendid property. In terms of capacity, there is more than enough room for over 200 people to attend North Shore House.

A whole host of services and features are available to help create an enjoyable time for everyone who books North Shore House. Pier Sixty serves as Manhattan's largest waterfront venue and one of the most customizable and expansive event spaces. This venue accommodates up to 750 for a wedding.

title: Harold Pratt House
description: Based in New York City, the Harold Pratt House is a vintage and historic mansion that features a classic ballroom and six spaces for hosting any wedding or special event. One of New York’s grand Park Avenue mansions originally constructed in 1919, many consider the Harold Pratt House to be one of the hidden gems of the Upper East Side.

A majestic marble staircase connects the ballroom and each of the six rooms, which includes a library, drawing room, and reception. Each room features cathedral ceilings, original chandeliers, fireplaces, and views of Park Avenue. Couples with larger guest counts can choose to use Peterson Hall that adjoins the rooms, and the mansion can hold up to 180 guests.

The ballroom, in conjunction with the other rooms of the house, can host any event, whether it is a bridal shower, ceremony, engagement party, or reception. The Harold Pratt House also includes a bridal suite, several audio/visual capabilities, and in-house furniture such as tables and chairs.

Inside the reception room are a fireplace and wood paneled walls, which bring warmth to the room. The reception room adjoins the drawing room and sitting room, which can all connect to be utilized for larger receptions. Moreover, the sitting room is a corner room with architectural moldings and a decorative fireplace that is used for more private and smaller parties, while the library fosters a dramatic setting fit for any reception. The library includes a marble fireplace, burnished walls, and a wraparound balcony for couples to use. The ballroom is fit for sit-down dinners, as there is beautiful inlaid flooring and gracious double-heighted windows that offer memorable views of Park Avenue.

This elegant home was constructed between 1919 and 1920 by architect William Adams Delano using the best available materials. It is said that the cost of construction equated to over one million dollars in 1920. In 1944, no one was living in the home, and as a result, the home was boarded up due to the Great Depression. On April 16, 1945, the home officially opened as the new headquarters for the Council on Foreign Relations, after it was donated to the Council.
location: 58 East 68Th Street New York, New York, 10065

title: Carnegie Hall
description: The idea of Carnegie Hall was born in the spring of 1887 during the honeymoon of Andrew Carnegie and Louise Whitfield. While on their transatlantic steamship voyage to Scotland, a friendship developed with Walter Damrosch—a leading conductor and musical director of the age—who dreamt of a new concert hall in New York City. The Hall opened four years later in 1891 and has been home to more than a century of meaningful moments in its vibrant history. And now, your lifelong duet can premiere at Carnegie Hall.

Just two blocks south of Central Park, the historic landmark is conveniently situated in the theater district of Manhattan and is the ideal setting for a magical wedding. The Weill Terrace Room, May Room, and Weill Music Room are private, thoughtfully designed, bright, flexible spaces adjacent to an expansive, landscaped rooftop terrace with a view of Central Park and the surrounding skyline. title: Tribeca Rooftop
description: Located in New York City, Tribeca Rooftop is a chic, industrial wedding venue. Situated on cobblestone streets in a 1920s printing press building, the property has an expansive glass atrium and large windowed walls. Providing unparalleled views of downtown and uptown Manhattan as well as the Hudson River, the facility is ideally situated to create dream weddings for every couple.

This property offers a 15,000-square-foot interior that can be customized to fit any event’s needs, along with a 25-foot glass-enclosed atrium. The rooftop is a dedicated terrace of 14,000 square feet, where couples can host their ceremony or reception. Inside the structure is a 1,100-square-foot black dance floor featuring a 12-foot high ceiling with an in-house pinspot lighting system. Couples receive a private entrance with dedicated elevator attendants, available valet service, wheelchair access, and the ability to customize branded exterior and interior signage.

Tribeca Rooftop and its sister venue, Tribeca 360°, are managed by Apogee Events, who will coordinate your special day. Before booking, you are welcome to schedule a private tour to ensure that everything meets your needs and expectations. On the wedding day, an on-site events manager will be present to arrange the vendors and provide any additional assistance. Their personable team can set up ahead of your event and clean up afterwards. To amplify the dance floor, audio equipment and lighting are available for rental. You can also request decor items including tables, chairs, drapery, linens, and china for the occasion.

In addition to their coordinating services, Tribeca Rooftop can also provide food and beverage options. Their catering team is able to create delectable hors d’oeuvres, two-course menus, desserts, and a wedding cake. Impressive stations including a Sushi and Sashimi Bar, Raw Bar, and Mediterranean Table can be prepared for the reception. Beverage service includes an open bar serving house wine and liquor, premium liquor, and signature cocktails.

title: Blu on the Hudson
description: Blu on the Hudson is opening their second floor ballroom in November 2024.
We do have space available in our restaurant that can accomodate up to 200 people for various Events and Galas.

Blu on the Hudson is a fine dining restaurant and wedding venue in Weehawken, New Jersey. The restaurant welcomes couples from fall 2024, and is situated on Lincoln Harbor, featuring an incredible view of New York City.

Blu on the Hudson's 18,000-square-foot rooftop event space offers couples a private space to host wedding celebrations. An indoor/outdoor space, the rooftop can accommodate large celebrations and suit any weather. The indoor area features Art Deco architecture, floor-to-ceiling windows, and a skylight, while elegant chandeliers and trailing lights add a whimsical touch. Moving outside, guests will find paved stone areas, lush greenery, and a water feature. Overlooking New York City, events here will feature a dazzling backdrop.

Providing best-in-class service, Blu brings fine dining to your wedding experience. The restaurant's menu includes a wide selection of cuisine and signature cocktails. Featured menu items include hand-rolled gnocchi, vegan radiatore, wagyu steak, and kusshi oysters. They also offer appetizers such as calamari, shrimp, and a heirloom tomato salad. Dessert options include tiramisu, panna cotta and s’mores.

The restaurant offers valet parking to ensure your arrival is smooth. Conveniently located near several hotels, couples and guests can easily prolong their stay in the city. Just half an hour's drive from Newark Liberty National Airport, the location is ideal for guests flying in. Nearby attractions like the Empire State Building, Statue of Liberty, and Times Square provide lots to do for a fun weekend. At Blu on The Hudson, you and your guest will enjoy a sense of sophistication and stunning views surrounded by the lively energy of New Jersey.

title: RGNY
description: Located on the North Fork of Long Island, NY, RGNY is a destination for wine lovers, families, and those wanting to take in the beautiful landscape of the wine-country region. We’re open seven days for tastings of our award-winning wines. Our picturesque estate is an ideal location for rehearsal dinners, showers, weddings, or any special occasion.
We look forward to meeting you!

RGNY's estate offers a splendid canvas for celebrations, accommodating up to 200 guests. Nestled amidst the captivating North Fork landscape, our venue exudes rustic elegance, providing a picturesque backdrop for weddings and intimate gatherings. With versatile indoor and outdoor spaces, couples can tailor their events to their vision, exchanging vows amidst the vineyards or celebrating in charming event spaces. Sweeping views and meticulously curated facilities make RGNY the ideal setting to elevate any occasion.

RGNY curates a comprehensive array of services for extraordinary celebrations. Our seasoned event professionals guide you through personalized wedding packages tailored to your desires. Collaborating with experienced local vendors ensures a seamless and memorable experience, from planning to execution. Couples explore our estate through exclusive tours, indulge in wine tastings, and envision their dream wedding against the backdrop of our charming vineyard. description: Ace Hotel is a modern hotel wedding venue situated in Brooklyn, New York. Located in the quaint and relaxed Boerum Hill neighborhood, this stylish property is inspired by the area’s cultural diversity and rich creative heritage. Accommodating up to 250 guests for a cocktail style evening and 120 guests for a seated dinner with a dancefloor, this second-floor space is ideal for receptions and features floor-to-ceiling windows that bathe the interior with shimmering natural light. The Stoop is inspired by the local area’s renowned stoop culture and features a full bar and ample space for cocktail-hour mingling. Finally, the Studio is an intimate window filled ceremony space with a variety of light fixtures and greenery.

At Ace Hotel Brooklyn, Director of Sales Megan Southerland and her coordination team are ready to provide you with a seamless and stress-free celebration experience. Offering a range of event spaces for hosting your full wedding weekend, from initimate gatherings to full bashes, after parties and morning after brunches, they will take care of every detail so that you can enjoy your special day to the absolute fullest.

title: 620 Loft & Garden
description: Located in New York, New York, 620 Loft & Garden offers couples a unique rooftop wedding venue with stunning views of Fifth Avenue. They offer a serene atmosphere within one of the busiest cities in the world, with their manicured historical gardens, reflective pools, and fountains. Outdoor events are held year-round on the rooftop, although parties may choose to occupy the inside open loft instead. Wall-to-wall windows offer a flood of light inside the completely customizable lofted space, with views of the Prometheus statue, the Channel Gardens, and the marquee of Radio City Music Hall. The private, customizable interior and outdoor spaces can accommodate up to 165 guests for a reception and 120 for a seated meal.

description: Characterized by its combination of vintage and modish styles, Houston Hall is a versatile wedding venue located in the heart of New York City.

You and your partner are invited to pledge your love and dance the night away at this one-of-a-kind Big Apple gem.

Houston Hall features a large and open-spaced floor plan. Able to accommodate up to 200 seated guests, the hall is replete with details that your loved ones will surely adore. Its exposed brick walls and wooden beams lend a dash of rustic charm to the venue. The skylights allow natural light to flow into the property, and the walls boast eye-catching hand-painted murals. A spacious and private get-ready room overlooks the hall. Given its dynamic, minimalist design, the event space can be customized to suit your stylistic vision.

Those who choose to marry at Houston Hall are sure to be impressed by the superlative staff. To become better acquainted with the facilities, you can enjoy a complimentary walking tour of the property. Further aspects of their service include:

This venue is suitable for weddings of 80 guests for seated dining or up to 150 with a cocktail-inspired reception. description: Marina del Rey is a waterfront wedding venue located in the Bronx, New York. Perfect for couples who desire beautiful views for their celebration in New York City, this property offers stunning views of the Long Island Sound and Manhattan’s skyline. Conveniently situated close to the Whitestone and Throgs Neck bridges, it is defined by its welcoming and wholesome atmosphere. The staff takes delight in bringing their clients’ dream weddings to life, welcoming soon-to-be newlyweds from all walks of life. Elegant event spaces, mouth-watering cuisine, and unbeatable service await at this New York hidden gem.

Able to host several hundred people, Marina del Rey is home to an array of outdoor and indoor event spaces. It can provide the backdrop for every stage of your once-in-a-lifetime occasion, from your “I do” moment to the departure of your getaway car. You and your partner can exchange vows at the Waterside Pavilion, an open-air setting that overlooks the East River. Featuring an eye-catching gazebo, a striking patio, and floral accents, this is a wonderful place to begin your new chapter. Following your ceremony, you and your loved ones can take a walk along the Open-Air Pier. Capable of accommodating up to 220 wedding-goers, the Patio is ideal for cocktail receptions. Boasting views of iconic New York City sights, it has a relaxed vibe that will surely allow your nearest and dearest to unwind. Indoor receptions can take place in the Bellagio Room, an indoor ballroom that provides ample space for dinner and dancing.

With years of professional experience, Marina del Rey’s staff is well-versed in realizing marital visions. description: Cloud 9 Yacht Charters is a boat wedding venue in New York. For more than 23 years, this company has provided luxurious private yachting opportunities for momentous occasions. With professionally attired staff, white-glove service, and departures from the marina of your choice, the team guarantees a sophisticated and seamless experience. On your big day, you and your guests will enjoy panoramic and unforgettable views of Manhattan’s skyline as your boat sails down the Hudson River. Spacious and elegant, these yachts are perfect for exclusive wedding events as unique as your love story.

Cloud 9 Yacht Charters has two luxurious yachts you can charter for your special occasion. The Cloud Nine III can host anywhere from 10-75 people, making it ideal for intimate celebrations. The Cloud Nine IV accommodates 75-150 guests comfortably and is best for grand affairs with all your loved ones. Both boats have three floors, black granite bars stocked with top-shelf liquors, private decks featuring DJ booths and lighting, and comfortable lounge seating. The Cloud Nine IV has a large dining room with eight-foot ceilings, which gives it a roomy feel. Along the walls, floor-to-ceiling windows provide 360-degree views of the harbor and cityscape. This banquet hall has a state-of-the-art sound system and a Yamaha baby grand piano. If you so choose, your meal can be accompanied by the tranquil sounds of this piano, which will create a refined and romantic ambiance. Upstairs, both yachts have a private suite with vanities where you can prepare for the festivities with your wedding party.

When booking Cloud 9 Yacht Charters for your ceremony and reception, you will get to work with the company’s team of seasoned event consultants. These professionals will ensure that every detail is accounted for so you can sit back, relax, and enjoy your big day. Rentals also include your choice of linens, drapery, signature lighting, premium champagne, crystal stemware, a custom wedding cake, and a private chef.

Whether you are looking for a formal sit-down dinner or a more casual buffet-style dining experience, Cloud 9 Yacht Charters’ culinary team has you covered. All dishes will be prepared fresh and hot in the downstairs galley, ready for you and your friends and family to dig in. These chefs also offer a variety of cuisine styles to accommodate your unique tastes and styles. The possibilities are endless, from sushi stations to a hot dog cart, decadent brunches to boozy martini bars.

Papillon’s expansive second floor offers a range of distinctive settings for wedding celebrations, accommodating events of all sizes, from intimate gatherings to grand receptions. The entire floor, including the Burgundy Room, Parlor Room, Balcony Space, and Main Bar, can host up to 300 guests for a cocktail-style reception. The Burgundy Room, with its high-top tables and private access to the main bar, is ideal for casual pre-wedding mixers for up to 60 guests. For a more intimate setting, the Prohibition Room provides a cozy space for 40 guests, complete with a private bar. Larger receptions or elegant sit-down dinners can be held in the spacious Parlor Room, which can accommodate 150 for a reception or 100 for dining, offering flexibility to suit your vision.

Papillon Bistro & Bar offers a full range of services to ensure your wedding is seamlessly executed. Their dedicated events team will assist with planning every detail, from customized layouts to day-of coordination. The talented culinary team work closely with couples to create bespoke wedding menus that you will remember for a lifetime. description: Bryant Park Grill is a restaurant wedding venue located in New York, New York. Located just behind the landmark New York Public Library, this venue is a sophisticated restaurant located in the heart of Manhattan. With a romantic dining room, a Parisian-style garden setting, and impeccable customer service, Bryant Park Grill is dedicated to making your special day truly spectacular.

Bryant Park Grill features three main spaces for your wedding day: a Rooftop Terrace with a picturesque views of Bryant Park, the Grill Dining Room, and the South Garden. The terrace is best suited for your wedding ceremony and can accommodate up to 220 guests. The restaurant can host a seated dinner for up to 220 guests. For couples interested in booking the full venue, up to 1,000 guests can be serviced.

A variety of all-inclusive packages are available for your perusal. All packages include the cost of chairs, tables, glassware, flatware, china, and linens. Setup and cleanup service is always provided. Brides and bridal parties can enjoy the complimentary bridal suite for getting ready needs. Chair covers, a dance floor, a tent and tent accessories, and general decor can be added to your package if desired. All areas are wheelchair accessible.

Chef Gadi Weinreich and Pastry Chef Anne-Marie Noonan are happy to craft a wedding day menu that meets your needs and dietary preferences. Both plated and buffet-style options are available, and passed hors d’oeuvres and stations of your choice are served during your cocktail hour. A chocolate fountain can be added to your package upon request. Bryant Park Grill features an extensive whiskey selection and a variety of classic cocktails. While you will need to secure an outside cake vendor, Bryant Park Grill is happy to provide complimentary cake cutting services.

Bryant Park Grill is conveniently situated within the city’s beloved Bryant Park just behind the landmark New York Public Library. A variety of park activities and excursions including ice skating, film festivals, and more are available but dependent on the season.

The dedicated staff at Ravel Hotel will be ready to assist you with your planning process from start to finish.
